title: New Features Released!
content: We've just released some exciting new features for the app! Now you can access new test categories and share your progress with friends. Make sure to check it out and let us know what you think!

title: Maintenance Update
content: We will be performing scheduled maintenance on the app servers from 2 AM to 4 AM on January 30th. During this time, the app may experience intermittent downtime. We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

title: Community Support Announcement
content: Your support means a lot to us! If you’re enjoying the app and want to contribute, consider supporting the development through JazzCash donations. Check out the details below. Thank you for being a part of our journey!

title: Coming Soon: Leaderboards
content: We’re excited to announce that leaderboards will be available soon! Compete with others in your category and track your progress. Stay tuned for the official release date!
